game.name: Super Meat Boy Forever
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, Remote Play TV, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Super Meat Boy is back! This time around Meat Boy is always running, literally it's an auto-runner. You will jump, dive, slide and punch your way through brutal levels and mean boss fights. We designed 5,000+ levels so you can play the game over and over without seeing the same level twice.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Super Meat Boy is back! This time around Meat Boy is always running, literally it's an auto-runner. You will jump, dive, slide and punch your way through brutal levels and mean boss fights. We designed 5,000+ levels so you can play the game over and over without seeing the same level twice.

reviewHighlights.text: 방향키 어디감???? 고기런이 왜 쿠키런이 되어버린것임????
솔직히 말해서 재밌는 건 진짜 재밌다. 오토러닝이라고 해도 주먹 내지르고 아래로 내리꽂는 맛도 있고, 전체적으로 잘 만든 게임이다. 단지 레전설이었던 원조의 맛과 너무 다르다.
